IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: The Northeast Organic Farming Association of Vermont promotes organic practices to build an economically viable, ecologically sound and socially just Vermont agricultural system that benefits all living things.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Coherence with grant application, receipts of purchase, follow up surveys.
The annual form 990 is provided to all members of the Board of Directors for review prior to filing.
Board members are asked to disclose any conflicts of interest with farms being certified as organic and/or with any organizations or projects that are applying for funding from NOFA.
The Governanace Committee of the Board of Directors establishes the salaries for all employees.
The Governanace Committee of the Board of Directors establishes the salaries for all employees.

NOFA's Articles of Association bylaws, and financial statements are available to the public on request by mail or via email. Our annual Form 990 and attached Schedules are also available on the website known as "Guide Star".
